Nintencat: The Parody
by Sly Dog Studios
2017/09/12

Would you like to take care of a virtual cat on your NES? I bet you would, so here is something that will allow you to do that! 
Have tons of fun with your virtual NES cat as it sits and stares at you, its toy, and generally makes you feel... bored! 
So good luck having fun with your cat!

https://slydogstudios.org/
